mapper.select:
SELECT tta.mkt_task_id, tta.sys_company_id, tta.sys_brand_id, tta.task_code, tta.task_type, tta.task_name, tta.start_time, tta.end_time, tta.task_info, tta.points, tta.task_list_img, tta.task_detail_img, tta.check_status, tta.task_status, tta.remark, tto.mkt_task_order_id, tto.order_source, tto.consume_amount, tto.consume_times, tmc.mkt_coupon_id, tmc.coupon_code, tmc.coupon_name, tmm.mkt_msg_id, tmm.msg_type, tmm.msg_code, tmm.template_msg_id, tmm.send_time, tmm.msg_content FROM t_mkt_task tta INNER JOIN t_mkt_task_order tto ON tta.mkt_task_id = tto.mkt_task_id LEFT JOIN t_mkt_coupon tmc ON tto.mkt_task_id = tmc.biz_id LEFT JOIN t_mkt_message tmm ON tmc.biz_id = tmm.biz_id WHERE 1=1
AND tta.mkt_task_id = #{mktTaskId}
